text: (tab zulekha un auraton se) bolee ki bas ye vahee to hai jisakee badaulat tum sab mujhe malaamat (bura bhala) karatee theen aur haan beshak main usase apana matalab haasil karane kee khud usase aarazoo mand thee magar ye bacha raha aur jis kaam ka main hukm detee hoon agar ye na karega to zarur qaid bhee kiya jaega aur zaleel bhee hoga (ye sab baaten yoosuph ne meree baaragaah mein) arz kee
